title: Coupling Coordinated Development among Digital Economy, Regional Innovation and Talent Employment A case study of Hangzhou Metropolitan Circle, China. (arXiv:2310.19008v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: Coordination development across various subsystems, particularly economic, social, cultural, and human resources subsystems, is a key aspect of urban sustainability that has a direct impact on the quality of urbanization. Hangzhou Metropolitan Circle composing Hangzhou, Huzhou, Jiaxing, Shaoxing, was the first metropolitan circle approved by National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC) as a demonstration of economic transformation. To evaluate the coupling degree of the four cities and to analyze the coordinative development in the three systems (Digital Economy System, Regional Innovation System, and Talent Employment System), panel data of these four cities during the period 2015-2022 were collected. The development level of these three systems were evaluated using standard deviation and comprehensive development index evaluation. The results are as follows: (1) the coupling coordination degree of the four cities in Hangzhou Metropolitan Circle has significant regional differenc

Title: Coupling Coordinated Development among Digital Economy, Regional Innovation and Talent Employment A case study of Hangzhou Metropolitan Circle, China. (arXiv:2310.19008v1 [econ.GN])
Abstract: Coordination development across various subsystems, particularly economic, social, cultural, and human resources subsystems, is a key aspect of urban sustainability that has a direct impact on the quality of urbanization. Hangzhou Metropolitan Circle composing Hangzhou, Huzhou, Jiaxing, Shaoxing, was the first metropolitan circle approved by National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC) as a demonstration of economic transformation. To evaluate the coupling degree of the four cities and to analyze the coordinative development in the three systems (Digital Economy System, Regional Innovation System, and Talent Employment System), panel data of these four cities during the period 2015-2022 were collected. The development level of these three systems were evaluated using standard deviation and comprehensive development index evaluation. translated_title: 数字经济、区域创新和人才就业的协调发展 在中国杭州都市圈的案例研究
translated_abstract: 各种子系统之间的协调发展，特别是经济、社会、文化和人力资源子系统，是城市可持续发展的关键，直接影响城市化的质量。杭州都市圈包括杭州、湖州、嘉兴、绍兴，是国家发展和改革委员会首次批准的经济转型示范区。本研究收集了2015-2022年这四个城市的面板数据，评估了这三个系统（数字经济系统、区域创新系统和人才就业系统）的协调度和综合发展水平。结果如下：（1）杭州都市圈的四个城市之间的协调协同程度存在显著的区域差异
tldr: 本研究通过对中国杭州都市圈的案例研究，评估了数字经济、区域创新和人才就业三个系统的协调发展程度，并发现存在显著的区域差异。
en_tdlr: This study evaluates the coordination development of digital economy, regional innovation, and talent employment systems in Hangzhou Metropolitan Circle, China, through a case study and identifies significant regional differences.
